dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: The hero finds himself in a vast, alien world unlike any he has ever seen.

dialogues.speaker: Alien Leader
dialogues.text: You are in the land of Zogar, the galaxy's gem.

dialogues.speaker: Hero
dialogues.text: I need to find a way to get back to my world.

dialogues.speaker: Alien Leader
dialogues.text: We may help you, but only if you prove yourself worthy.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: The hero stands determined, ready to face whatever challenges lay ahead.
